item.title: Melissa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, Nothing is going to get better. It's not." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Be awesome! Be a book nut!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Melissa add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Beatrix Potter
item.description: "Thank goodness I was never sent to school; it would have rubbed off some of the originality." -- Beatrix Potter

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Joan Didion
item.description: "We tell ourselves stories in order to live." -- Joan Didion

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "The holiday season is a time for storytelling, and whether you are hearing the story of a candelabra staying lit for more than a week, or a baby born in a barn without proper medical supervision, these stories often feature miracles. Miracles are like pimples, because once you start looking for them you find more than you ever dreamed you'd see, and this holiday story features any number of miracles, depending on your point of view." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "So, please, oh please, we beg, we pray, go throw your TV set away, and in its place you can install, a lovely bookcase on the wall." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Cornelia Funke
item.description: "If you take a book with you on a journey," Mo had said when he put the first one in her box, "an odd thing happens: The book begins collecting your memories. And forever after you have only to open that book to be back where you first read it. It will all come into your mind with the very first words: the sights you saw in that place, what it smelled like, the ice cream you ate while you were reading it... yes, books are like flypaperâ€”memories cling to the printed page better than anything else." -- Cornelia Funke

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Sir Francis Bacon
item.description: "Some books should be tasted, some devoured, but only a few should be chewed and digested thoroughly." -- Sir Francis Bacon

item.title: Melissa add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "You can never get a cup of tea large enough or a book long enough to suit me." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "I want an Oompa-Loompa!' screamed Veruca." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "The hurrier I go, the behinder I get." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Those who don't believe in magic will never find it." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Melissa add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Melissa add a quote by John Muir
item.description: "Handle a book as a bee does a flower, extract its sweetness but do not damage it." -- John Muir

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "I understand what you're saying, and your comments are valuable, but I'm gonna ignore your advice." -- Roald Dahl
